attributes.action: Remove and ban all MPs who were fined for breaking COVID lock down rules.
attributes.additional_details: Boris Johnson and the conservative party as a whole have flaunted COVID lockdown laws while others had to miss saying goodbye to loved ones. Such flaunting of laws and rule which were made by those flaunting should not be left without due cause and effect, given both the role of these individuals and the income of which they are privileged to have.
attributes.background: Every MP that has been fined by the police for breaking COVID lockdown laws to be removed from post (with pay stopping in immediate effect) and banned from running for post in parliament again.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments. This includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.

You might like to sign the following petitions, which call for related actions:

Require MPs who break the law be removed from office
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614705

An MP found guilty of breaking any law is automatically subject to recall
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614888
